head.heading: Premises and equipment available for booking
head.text: Through Varaamo, you can reserve public premises and equipment for your own use

infoRecurring.heading: Recurring reservations
infoRecurring.text: Apply to spaces and equipment for recurring use. You can browse spaces before the application period.

footer.heading: About Varaamo
footer.body:
Varaamo is an online service run by the City of Helsinki, through which you can reserve public premises and workstations for your use.

The revamped premises reservation service is in a pilot phase. New features and functionalities are being gradually introduced.
